name: QuesterConversation
0:
”Alexa, open quester conversation”
”Alexa, start quester conversation”
”Alexa, begin quester conversation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quester conversation
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill allows Alexa to conduct a one-on-one interview with the user. The interview topic is centered around the user’s thoughts about their favorite beverage. The questions asked by Alexa are open-ended, with Alexa delivering follow-up questions based on the respondent’s previous answer. The users will always have the ability to say “Help” to get more information on the how to answer the current question, or he/she can say “Repeat” to hear the question or options another time.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
